name: Elysium Online MMORPG
description:
Start out as a simple warrior and get stronger as time goes on. Defeat enemies, craft equipment, earn huge amounts of gold and exp, win very important events, level up your character and much more in this MMORPG game.

This is only an alpha version which is still in development.

This game is also cross-platform, so you can play on your PC when you're home or play on the go on your mobile device !

You can also support the game on Patreon !
